name: IEEE-2018 5th International Conference on Industrial Engineering and Applications
content: ◤April 26-28, 2018◢. Conference official website: http://iciea.org/. We have the strong organization team, dependable reputation and wide sponsors all around the world. ++ Accepted and presented papers of ICIEA 2018 will be published by IEEE conference proceedings. Published papers are expected to be included in IEEE Xplore and indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus etc. ICIEA 2017 proceedings already gets included in IEEE Xplore. ◆Keynote &Plenary Speakers: Prof. Felix T. S. Chan, the Hong Kong Polytechnic University, Hong Kong; Prof. Shey-Huei Sheu, Providence University, Taiwan; Prof. George Zhang, Western Washington University, USA; ◆Contact: Dr. Allen Foster /+86-13688461344 / iciea\_conf@163.com
